title: 举报
author: Redstone_ray
txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=730815&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D3%26searchoption%5B23%5D%5Bvalue%5D%5B41%5D%3D41%26searchoption%5B23%5D%5Btype%5D%3Dcheckbox%26searchoption%5B208%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D1%26searchoption%5B208%5D%5Btype%5D%3Dselect%26searchoption%5B80%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D1%26searchoption%5B80%5D%5Btype%5D%3Dradio
[混合] [双线]竹萌服务器 —— 新小游戏「垃圾分类」发布！[1.13.2-1.14.4]
最后在线：14天以前
https://minecraft-mp.com/server-s176439

replies.author: ir-0
replies.txt_content: 请写明举报的违规项目

replies.author: LonelyDream
replies.txt_content:
1.服务器宣传帖违规（不含关服）
2.服务器恶意侮辱玩家/充值后未给予相应物品
3.抄袭其他服务器原创性内容
4.玩家对服务器的客观评价（收费制度不合理等）
5.对服务器/审核版版主的投诉

见https://www.mcbbs.net/forum-servercomplaint-1.html版头
关服不能算举报项目
